程序包 ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

类 LightLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LightLocalizer
  • public class LightLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    The light localizer for the project. This class Contain methods which can use light sensors to localize(i.e. correct) the robot to a specific point.
    作者:
    Junjian Chen

      Get sample from colorSensor1.
      static int getSample2()
      Get sample from colorSensor2.
      static void initialize()
      Initialize two sampleArrays.
      static void localize()
      Localizes the robot to (x, y, theta) = (1, 1, 0).
      static void localizeToNearest​(double angle)
      Localize the robot to a point around, depends on the input angle.

    • 方法详细资料

      • localize

        public static void localize()
        Localizes the robot to (x, y, theta) = (1, 1, 0).

      • localizeToNearest

        public static void localizeToNearest​(double angle)
        Localize the robot to a point around, depends on the input angle.
        参数:
        angle - The angle robot turn by after first line detection.

      • readColor1

        public static int readColor1()
        Use median filter to return the correct value of sample.
        返回:
        flitered sample from ColorSenosr2

      • readColor2

        public static int readColor2()
        Use median filter to return the correct value of sample.
        返回:
        flitered sample from ColorSenosr2

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initialize two sampleArrays.

      • getSample1

        public static int getSample1()
        Get sample from colorSensor1.
        返回:
        sample from colorSensor1

      • getSample2

        public static int getSample2()
        Get sample from colorSensor2.
        返回:
        sample from colorSensor2

      • waitFor

        public static void waitFor​(int time)
        Wait for a given time
        参数:
        time - The number of physical steps to wait
